alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Izard; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Stone, northwestern Izard, southwestern Fulton and southeastern Baxter Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Calico Rock, or 15 miles west of Melbourne, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calico Rock... Norfork... Salesville... Pineville... Rodney... Norfork Dam... Culp... Wideman... Lone Star... Gorby... Herron... Blanchard Springs Campground... Mt Olive in Izard County... Boswell... Optimus... Dolph... Lone Rock... Sylamore Bike Trail... Sylamore Shooting Range... Jordan... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
